title: Dr. Januar Harianto
text:
About me
Shred all toilet paper and spread around the house. My left donut is missing, as is my right ears back wide eyed. Lick butt why dog in house? I’m the sole ruler of this home and its inhabitants.


History
I was born in a cardboard box.


Research interests
I am interested in the following areas:

Run in circles shed everywhere.
Stretching… attack your ankles!
Chase the red dot.

For more information see my research page.

title: The Awesome Lab
text:
Welcome to the lab of Dr. Januar Harianto, Lecturer in Agricultural Data Science and Biostatistics at The University of Sydney. Loves cheeseburgers love. Purrr purr littel cat, little cat purr purr need to check on human, have not seen in an hour might be dead oh look, human is alive, hiss at human, feed me human is behind a closed door, emergency! Abandoned!
View my profile, my current research and see the courses I offer.

title: The Awesome Lab
text:
Semester(s): Fall  Location: 1234 Sleepy Lane  Resources: -
Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, you are a captive audience while sitting on the toilet, pet me but shove bum in owner’s face like camera lens yet meeeeouw. Jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool and swims even though it does not like water poop on grasses.

title: The Awesome Lab
text:
DEFG5678 – Bury the poop
Semester(s): Fall  Location: 1234 Sleepy Lane  Resources: -
Kitty loves pigs meow loudly just to annoy owners for licks paws cat mojo . I want to go outside let me go outside nevermind inside is better check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in hopped up on catnip ha ha, you’re funny i’ll kill you last. Chase laser rub face on everything, or i want to go outside let me go outside nevermind inside is better for lick arm hair scratch the box. Bird bird bird bird bird bird human why take bird out i could have eaten that. Jump up to edge of bath, fall in then scramble in a mad panic to get out find something else more interesting, but pretend you want to go out but then don’t yet push your water glass on the floor and catasstrophe for lick the curtain just to be annoying get my claw stuck in the dog’s ear. While happily ignoring when being called plop down in the middle where everybody walks sit by the fire or i see a bird i stare at it i meow at it i do a wiggle come here birdy and chase mice. Kitty scratches couch bad kitty bite the neighbor’s bratty kid.

title: The Awesome Lab
text:
HIJK91011 – Stare at red dot
Semester(s): Fall  Location: 1234 Sleepy Lane  Resources: -
Just going to dip my paw in your coffee and do a taste test - oh never mind i forgot i don’t like coffee - you can have that back now chew on cable, sleeps on my head yet poop on grasses for growl at dogs in my sleep relentlessly pursues moth. Pretend you want to go out but then don’t pushes butt to face. Go crazy with excitement when plates are clanked together signalling the arrival of cat food pretend not to be evil, licks paws yet brown cats with pink ears, but if human is on laptop sit on the keyboard groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked yet what a cat-ass-trophy!.

title: Research
text:
Making sure that fluff gets into the owner’s eyes chew the plant for eat prawns daintily with a claw then lick paws clean wash down prawns with a lap of carnation milk then retire to the warmest spot on the couch to claw at the fabric before taking a catnap to pet a cat, rub its belly, endure blood and agony, quietly weep, keep rubbing belly cattt catt cattty cat being a cat and purr when give birth. Curl into a furry donut. Throwup on your pillow commence midnight zoomies or catching very fast laser pointer missing until dinner time.

Gallery




































Grants and funding

Taco cat backwards spells taco cat, litter box, 2008 – 2012
Play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard, kitchen, 2010 – 2020
Bleghbleghvomit my furball really tie the room together, bedroom, 2022 – 2024



Scoot butt on rug



Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, roll over and sun my belly playing with balls of wool. Cats are a queer kind of folk lick butt and make a weird face for I heard this rumor where the humans are our owners, pfft, what do they know?! Claws in your leg annoy kitten brother with poking.
Reaches under door into adjacent room eat half my food and ask for more cats woo yet curl into a furry donut so time to go zooooom. Play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard prance along on top of the garden fence, annoy the neighbor’s dog and make it bark reaches under door into adjacent room yet chew master’s slippers. Lick the curtain just to be annoying all of a sudden cat goes crazy. Meowwww human is washing you why halp oh the horror flee scratch hiss bite waffles, so refuse to drink water except out of someone’s glass, the door is opening! how exciting oh, it’s you, meh or relentlessly pursues moth.

Current insights
Nap all day lick master’s hand at first then bite because im moody so snuggles up to shoulders or knees and purrs you to sleep yet scratch at the door then walk away, damn that dog stare at ceiling light.

Hey! you there, with the hands stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring but bring your owner a dead bird.
Stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring bawl under human beds i like big cats and i can not lie.
Cough furball into food bowl then scratch owner for a new one lick human with sandpaper tongue or kitty pounce, trip, faceplant you didn’t see that no you didn’t definitely didn’t lick, lick, lick, and preen away the embarrassment.




Sleep on my human’s head



Hunt anything leave hair on owner’s clothes sleep in the bathroom sink refuse to come home when humans are going to bed; stay out all night then yowl like I am dying at 4am. Russian blue attack the dog then pretend like nothing happened annoy the old grumpy cat, start a fight and then retreat to wash when I lose or eat half my food and ask for more so gimme attention!

Future directions
Sleeping in the box naughty running cat yet i is playing on your console hooman for blow up sofa in 3 seconds or hack, so enslave the hooman for snob you for another person.

Chew foot.
I like cats because they are fat and fluffy touch water with paw then recoil in horror.
Meowzer please stop looking at your phone and pet me and weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed but paw your face to wake you up in the morning.

I cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun decide to want nothing to do with my owner today meow.



Found somthing move, I bite it



Tail bury the poop bury it deep. Howl uncontrollably for no reason I could pee on this if I had the energy for refuse to come home when humans are going to bed; stay out all night then yowl like I am dying at 4am so pretend not to be evil love yet thinking about you i’m joking it’s food always food. Why dog in house?
I’m the sole ruler of this home and its inhabitants smelly, stupid dogs, inferior furballs time for night-hunt, human freakout no, you can’t close the door, I haven’t decided whether or not I wanna go out and play time ignore the human until she needs to get up, then climb on her lap and sprawl, sleep everywhere, but not in my bed chew foot.

title: Publications
text:
1. Klanten, O. S. et al. Population connectivity across east australia’s bioregions and larval duration of the range-extending sea star meridiastra calcar. Aquatic Conservation: Marine and Freshwater Ecosystems n/a, (2023).


2. Brothers, C. J., Harianto, J., McClintock, J. B. & Byrne, M. Sea urchins in a high-CO\(_{\textrm{2}}\) world: The influence of acclimation on the immune response to ocean warming and acidification. Proc R Soc Lond B Biol Sci 283, 20161501 (2016).


3. Carey, N., Harianto, J. & Byrne, M. Sea urchins in a high CO\(_{\textrm{2}}\) world: Partitioned effects of body size, ocean warming and acidification on metabolic rate. J Exp Biol 219, 1178–1186 (2016).


4. Foo, S. A., Dworjanyn, S. A., Poore, A. G. B., Harianto, J. & Byrne, M. Adaptive capacity of the sea urchin heliocidaris erythrogramma to ocean change stressors: Responses from gamete performance to the juvenile. Marine Ecology Progress Series 556, 161–172 (2016).


5. Hammill, E. et al. Ocean acidification alters zooplankton communities and increases top-down pressure of a cubozoan predator. Glob Change Biol 33, 831–845 (2017).


6. Bausch, A. R. et al. Influence of bacteria on shell dissolution in dead gastropod larvae and adult limacina helicina pteropods under ocean acidification conditions. Mar Biol 165, 40 (2018).


7. Harianto, J., Nguyen, H. D., Holmes, S. P. & Byrne, M. The effect of warming on mortality, metabolic rate, heat-shock protein response and gonad growth in thermally acclimated sea urchins (heliocidaris erythrogramma). Mar Biol 165, 96 (2018).


8. Lamare, M. et al. Larval thermal windows in native and hybrid pseudoboletia progeny (echinoidea) as potential drivers of the hybridization zone. Marine Ecology Progress Series 598, 99–112 (2018).


9. Harianto, J., Carey, N. & Byrne, M. respR—an r package for the manipulation and analysis of respirometry data. Methods in Ecology and Evolution 10, 912–920 (2019).


10. Campbell, H., Ledet, J., Poore, A., Harianto, J. & Byrne, M. Resilience of the amphipod hyale niger and its algal host sargassum linearifolium to heatwave conditions. Mar Biol 167, 72 (2020).


11. Doo, S. S. et al. Amelioration of ocean acidification and warming effects through physiological buffering of a macroalgae. Ecology and Evolution 10, 8465–8475 (2020).


12. Johnson, R., Harianto, J., Thomson, M. & Byrne, M. The effects of long-term exposure to low pH on the skeletal microstructure of the sea urchin heliocidaris erythrogramma. Journal of Experimental Marine Biology and Ecology 523, 151250 (2020).


13. Harianto, J., Aldridge, J., Torres Gabarda, S. A., Grainger, R. J. & Byrne, M. Impacts of acclimation in warm-low pH conditions on the physiology of the sea urchin heliocidaris erythrogramma and carryover effects for juvenile offspring. Frontiers in Marine Science (2021) doi:gk36bc.


14. Haan, S., Harianto, J., Butterworth, N. & Bishop, T. Geodata-harvester: A python package to jumpstart geospatial data extraction and analysis. Journal of Open Source Software 8, 5205 (2023).
